plot: A girl has struggled her whole life with bullying. She confronts her bully through a game of chess when she has a series of flashbacks. These flashbacks give her the courage to defeat her bully in the end.
title: Überprüfen Genosse
plot_es: A girl has struggled her whole life with bullying. She confronts her bully through a game of chess when she has a series of flashbacks. These flashbacks give her the courage to defeat her bully in the end.
plot_en: A girl has struggled her whole life with bullying. She confronts her bully through a game of chess when she has a series of flashbacks. These flashbacks give her the courage to defeat her bully in the end.
